question: Which nation's anti-desertification program is the "Three-North Shelter Forest Program"?
explanation: Three-North Shelter Forest Program, also known as Green Great Wall, is the anti-deforestation program of China to stop the expansion of the Gobi Desert. This program involves the human-planting of windbreaking forest strips or shelterbelts which started in 1978 and planned to be completed around 2050. It forms the largest artificial forest in the world. This program also protect other nations such as Japan, North Korea and South Korea from duststorm of Gobi Desert.
